titleStmt.title: The life of Merlin, sirnamed Ambrosius his prophesies and predictions interpreted, and their truth made good by our English Annalls : being a chronographicall history of all the kings, and memorable passages of this kingdome, from Brute to the reigne of our royall soveraigne King Charles ...
Life of Merlin, sirnamed Ambrosius
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Okes, and are to be sold by Jasper Emery ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
